Name: PluginMaxFailureCount
Description: Maximum number of failure counts before plugin is disabled

Name: PluginFailureCountResetTime
Description: Time after first failure at which the failure count is reset

Name: Module
Description: The name of the module that registered this plugin

Name: Dependencies
Description: Multi string of plugin names of plugins that this plugin depends on

Name: FailureReason
Description: Reason for first failure.  One of the plugin status values.

Name: Parameters
Description: Plugin parameters.  The schema beyond this is plugin dependent.

Name: ModuleMaxFailureCount
Description: Maximum number of failure counts before module is disabled

Name: ModuleFailureCountResetTime
Description: Time after first failure at which the failure count is reset

Name: ImagePath
Description: Path to the DLL (including DLL name)

Name: FailureReason
Description: Reason for last failure.  One of the module status values.

Name: PluginList
Description: List of plugins implemented in the module

Name: # The OpenAFS plug-in is installed separately.
